Description_lang: Lihuvim redirects and channels protoform energy into nearby Protoform Forges. Doing so bathes the area in radiant light, inficting $363538s1 Cosmic damage every $t1 sec.The longer this process takes, the more protoform energy is release, and the more damage is inflicted.
AuraDescription_lang: Channeling protoform energy and inflicting Cosmic damage every $t1 sec.
